walkthrough.title: My First Square
walkthrough.summary: You have to start somewhere. We'll jump right in at square'sville. This walkthrough will get you familiar with many WebGL concepts that you will continue to build upon.

script.summary: Holds both fragment AND vertex shaders string text.

This file is NOT required for WebGL. Instead, this is just ONE of many ways to load shader program code into Javascript. You do NOT have to load shader program code this same way. If you use this strategy, getShaderCode is a handy custom function for accessing large chunks of strings that are kept separate from the main javascript, in separate .js files.
